text: "Scratch My Back" is a single by Portuguese musical artist, Aurea, available on her second studio album, Soul Notes (2012). It was composed by Rui Ribeiro, Ricardo Ferreira and João Pedro Matos. Its release took place on Aurea's birthday, September 7, 2012, through Blim Records, marking her last single since 2011. The 2011 song was a cover of "Dream a Little Dream of Me". In 2013, it was nominated for Best Song of 2012 at the 2013 Golden Globes, but lost to Ana Moura’s "Desfado".
title: Scratch My Back
